name: Namco Classic II
overview: Namco Classic II is a golf game developed by TOSE and published by Namco for the Famicom in 1992. The game features three courses to choose from and game modes such as Round Play, which you can use to practice the course in the game or compete with friends up to four players. There's also a Tournament mode, where you play against a computer opponent in an effort to win a large amount of prize money.
